txt.en: 'Everything is so calm in this moment, I scarcely recognize it. These past few days have been a whirlwind. I have not had a chance to stop the winds and listen, to find peace.\n\n'I would have words with Amalíbi. She said many things in that hall, and I agree with all of them. Many of the things I said I do not agree with, but such is passion. I have many mistakes for which I must atone. Would you accompany me to see her?'
Speak with Mizâdi in Iridír when you are ready to go
'I hear her words, but I do not yet feel them. Perhaps in time I will.\n\n'Thank you, friend. Your presence has been a constant comfort, and one for which I am quite grateful.'
A small moment of peace has given Mizâdi time to speak with Amalíbi, to see the consequences of her decisions.
'Let us go then, to Amalíbi's encampment, to mend what wounds we can.'
Speak with Mizâdi in Iridír when you are ready to go.
